description: A tool to clip regions of a volume in various ways, such as above/below certain coordinates or within a specified box.

left_xmm.title: Left Xmm
left_xmm.description: Set to 0 slices left of Xmm

right_xmm.title: Right Xmm
right_xmm.description: Set to 0 slices right of Xmm

anterior_ymm.title: Anterior Ymm
anterior_ymm.description: Set to 0 slices anterior to Ymm

posterior_ymm.title: Posterior Ymm
posterior_ymm.description: Set to 0 slices posterior to Ymm

box.title: Box Clipping
box.description: Clip the volume to a box centered at Cx, Cy, Cz (RAI mm), and of dimensions Dx Dy Dz (RAI mm).

mask_box.title: Mask Box Clipping
mask_box.description: Set all values inside the box to 1. Box centered at Cx, Cy, Cz (RAI mm), and of dimensions Dx Dy Dz (RAI mm).

and_logic.title: And Logic
and_logic.description: Combine with next clipping planes using 'and'.

or_logic.title: Or Logic
or_logic.description: Combine with next clipping planes using 'or'.

crop.title: Crop
crop.description: Same as -crop_greedy, kept for backward compatibility.

crop_npad.title: Crop Npad
crop_npad.description: Set 3dAutobox's -npad option to NPAD. NPAD fattens the volume a little after cropping.

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Output prefix for the resultant volume. Default is the input prefix with _clp suffixed to it.

followers.title: Followers
followers.description: Apply the same clipping or cropping treatment to the follower datasets.
